Verb - Nifal - Perfect - third person masculine singular
65.str2: To jut over, exceed, to excel, to remain, be left, to leave, cause to abound, preserve
Caleb -- a son of Jephunneh and sent by Moses to spy out the land
Jephunneh -- father of Caleb, also an Asherite

65.parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - masculine singular
65.str2: Joshua -- 'the LORD is salvation', Moses' successor, also the name of a number of Israelites
